title: A change to make Veigar's Event horizon better to play against
body:
why not instead of a cage that appears for no reason just make it a black hole that slows enemies in it and suck them slowly to the center it can reduce the distance of dashes and stun if the enemy hits the center it has a small cast time where it starts to form but it wouldn't be that much then veigar can have an AOE stun that has more meaningful counterplay and makes it easier to land his dark matter without a stun plus if it proves to be just a little too weak add a small damage per second effect for people in it.this change gives immobile champions a chance to escape and  helps veigar fight against mobile champions like his event horizon already does.Also it makes sense since an Event horizon is a black hole   
definition of event horizon :a theoretical boundary around a black hole beyond which no light or other radiation can escape.
a point of no return

replies.body: The CD on it really needs to be increased. It is a monster ability in teamfights that can be used more than once right now if the fight drags out at all.
His stun used to be instant, Idk why people are asking for more

well i honestly dont want veigar to be nerfed but if they can change his stun it would help his case plus it would be easy to balance they can adjust his the suction speed if too much or too little they can adjust the slow and damage and the stun duration this idea gives so much for us to work with balance wise

both of these were recommended changes by the players immediately after patch 5.4, shame, riot does as riot pleases, regardless of the consequences.

or just make it so the first person who enters his E gets stunned, everyone else after that gets slowed
